arts.ttl: Metz predicted XI v Marseille: No Stambouli for Les Grenats, but Ballo-Touré returns
arts.sum: Metz remain rooted to the bottom of Ligue 1 and in desperate need of points before the international break. Stephane Le Mignan’s side will host an in-form Marseille outfit without…

arts.ttl: Marseille predicted XI v Metz: Angel Gomes and Amine Gouiri to start for Les Phocéens
arts.sum: After a morale-boosting win over Ajax in midweek, Marseille travel to bottom side Metz looking to round off their week and head into the international break on a high. Roberto…
